thread.title: Le tout confort!
thread.title_full: Le tout confort! - Review of Le Meurice, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 888anthony
title: Le tout confort!
text:
From the moment that you enter the swing doors of the hotel you are lifted into a different world of comfort and service. The rooms looking out over the Tuileries are marvellous and give you an awesome view of the City. There is a feeling of intimacy as the hotel is not enormous and the staff are always friendly and helpful. The two restaurants are outstanding if expensive. The position is ideal for shopping and the entertainment facilities of central Paris. Could not recommend more highly.
